text: Kɨ ian tongɨn ikia egha bizir bar avɨribagh ami, egha kamaghɨn uabɨ ian aka, kɨ guizɨn Aposel. Kɨ tugha gavgavigha osɨmtɨziba ateri, egha mirakelɨn avɨriba, ko dɨgavir kuram gamir araziba, ko Godɨn gavgavim itir ingangariba, ian tongɨn dagh ami. Ezɨ bizir kaba kamaghɨn nan ian akazɨ ia fo, kɨ Godɨn ingangarim gami.
